title: I need quick answers please
body: This is about the priority queues. If you're playing a match and then you disconnect and then reconnect do you still get a priority queue? Because for me i already have a priority queue and the game before said i only had one more game til it expired but now im waiting on another one... like in the past ive had 6 priority queues and people said it was a bug (pls fix btw) and im not sure if this is the same occasion or im having another priority queue

replies.body: but i didnt leave the leave buster just kicked me...

> but i didnt leave the leave buster just kicked me...

What do you mean? Do you mean you restarted the queue/ the que restarted?
i was in game and i had to go to the toilet and when i came back it said you will now be kicked from the game

> [{quoted}](name=toxique,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=OXV2ErR5,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-02-28T12:28:47.288+0000)
>
> i was in game and i had to go to the toilet and when i came back it said you will now be kicked from the game

The automatic leaver buster system sensed your inactivity.

{From the [FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h3q3))}
> WHAT HAPPENS WHEN I LEAVE/DODGE A GAME AFTER WAITING IN THE LOW PRIORITY QUEUE?
If you dodge during champion select after waiting in low priority queue, you will have to go through low priority queue all over again even if you already waited through it before.

If you disconnect during one of your 5 games, I would assume you get placed in the low priority queue again (maybe it escalates to a 10 game LPQ). This is because you have to play out those 5 games **without** leaving. (At least this is what I understood from the FAQ, I could be wrong though)

Check here for the [full leaver buster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h3q3)
